input.sentences: the husband and wife are happy and getting ready for the party .
the birthday cake is full of a lot of candles .
two friends are having a great time at the party .
everyone is dancing and having a good time at the party .
the husband and wife are having a good time with the rest of the guests .
output.sentences: He is waiting for his wife to finish getting ready for a birthday party.
A lot of the couple's friends will be there to enjoy the candles and cake.
This time was set aside to party with friends.
They spent a lot of time at the party talking and dancing.
His wife because tired after hanging out for quite some time, and decided to go to bed to rest.
